column1: Uchi////This is my favorite restaurant in Houston. The social menu is a great deal--we order several of our favorites from that menu
column2: get a few things off the regular menu
column4: and the bill comes in under $100. Little appreciated is how amazing the acoustics are--even when the restaurant is full
column5: you can still hear the people at your table and talk without straining your voice. The food is both delicious and fun (I love the wagyu hot rock)
